live_updates: This issue has been resolved, Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
35589.summary: Some customers in the West End & City Centre areas of Kamloops are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
35589.title: Mar 30 – Kamloops (West End & City Centre) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Work is still being done on-site to restore service to the remaining customers, with no ETR at this time.  We appreciate your continued patience.
Our technicians have been able to restore service to roughly half the affected customers and are continuing to work to get the rest online as soon as possible.

Technicians continue to work to restore service. However, due to the nature of the repairs involved, we do not currently have an estimated time of resolution. We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. We estimate services to be restored by 10:15 AM
35588.summary: Some customers in the Lynn Valley area of North Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
35588.title: Mar 30 – North Vancouver (Lynn Valley) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Services have been fully restored.  Thank you for your patience.
Services had been impacted by a Hydro outage, and we have placed a generator in the area to restore services.  We will continue to monitor this issue until the Hydro outage is resolved.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. We estimate your service will be restored by 2:15pm.
35592.summary: Some customers in the Japantown & Downtown Eastside areas of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
35592.title: Mar 30 – Vancouver (Japantown & Downtown Eastside) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Services have been restored.  Thank you for your patience.
We continue to await restoration of hydro power to our equipment serving the affected areas.
We await restoration of hydro power to be restored in the affected areas. Once hydro is restored our services will begin to come online.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
35587.summary: Some customers in the Elmwood area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services due to Hydro related difficulties. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
35587.title: Mar 30 – Winnipeg (Elmwood) | All Services - Hydro Related - Outage (Resolved)
